alert.note: Alert for Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 7:22PM EDT until July 24 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN AROOSTOOK COUNTY... At 722 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Madawaska Lake, or 12 miles south of Madawaska, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Madawaska, Van Buren, New Canada, Lille, Madawaska Lake, Cross Lake, Grand Isle, Stockholm, Hamlin, Sinclair, Guerette, Cyr Plantation and Saint Agatha. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
